title: Family Guy Holiday Special Trailer: Peter Griffin Goes on a Christmas Mission
description: A new Family Guy Holiday Special trailer is out. It previews the 25th edition of the long-running Christmas-themed episode of the hit animated comedy franchise. What happens in the Family Guy Holiday Special trailer? The trailer sees Peter forget that Christmas is right around the corner, and — after losing Lois’ gift — breaking into […] The post Family Guy Holiday Special Trailer: Peter Griffin Goes on a Christmas Mission appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Anthony Nash
excerpt: A new Family Guy Holiday Special trailer is out, previewing the 25th edition of the long-running Christmas-themed episode.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: A new Family Guy Holiday Special trailer is out. It previews the 25th edition of the long-running Christmas-themed episode of the hit animated comedy franchise. What happens in the Family Guy Holiday Special trailer? The trailer sees Peter forget that Christmas is right around the corner, and — after losing Lois’ gift — breaking into a nursing home in order to steal a piece of jewelry. The trailer also teases Stewie and Brian getting into some antics, while also teasing some cutaway gags that feature Santa and more. The Family Guy Holiday Special will be available to watch on Hulu beginning on November 25, 2024. Check out the Family Guy Holiday Special trailer below (watch other trailers and clips): “Peter must recover Lois’ Christmas brooch after gifting it away in a White Elephant exchange. Stewie changes his attitude upon learning he’s on Santa’s ‘Naughty List,’” reads the episode’s logline.  As per usual, the cast for the special includes the main cast of Family Guy, including show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis, and Arif Zahir. Disney+ Has the Best Bundle in the Business Sign-up today for access to Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+ Family Guy is in the midst of celebrating its 25th anniversary as a show. The series originally premiered in 1999, and despite an early cancellation and return, has gone on to become one of the most popular and well-known animated comedy series’ of all time. The show recently moved to Wednesday nights on Fox beginning earlier this year, and has aired 23 seasons as of now.
html:
A new Family Guy Holiday Special trailer is out. It previews the 25th edition of the long-running Christmas-themed episode of the hit animated comedy franchise.

What happens in the Family Guy Holiday Special trailer?

The trailer sees Peter forget that Christmas is right around the corner, and — after losing Lois’ gift — breaking into a nursing home in order to steal a piece of jewelry. The trailer also teases Stewie and Brian getting into some antics, while also teasing some cutaway gags that feature Santa and more.

The Family Guy Holiday Special will be available to watch on Hulu beginning on November 25, 2024.

Check out the Family Guy Holiday Special trailer below (watch other trailers and clips):

“Peter must recover Lois’ Christmas brooch after gifting it away in a White Elephant exchange. Stewie changes his attitude upon learning he’s on Santa’s ‘Naughty List,’” reads the episode’s logline. 

As per usual, the cast for the special includes the main cast of Family Guy, including show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis, and Arif Zahir.

Disney+ Has the Best Bundle in the Business

Sign-up today for access to Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+

Family Guy is in the midst of celebrating its 25th anniversary as a show. The series originally premiered in 1999, and despite an early cancellation and return, has gone on to become one of the most popular and well-known animated comedy series’ of all time. The show recently moved to Wednesday nights on Fox beginning earlier this year, and has aired 23 seasons as of now.
